alert.note: Alert for Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 23 at 1:40PM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Avery, Yancey, Mitchell, Caldwell Mountains, Burke Mountains and McDowell Mountains Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Where winds blow across roadways, high profile vehicles may be difficult to keep on the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Weather Advisory also remains in effect for Avery, Mitchell, and Yancey counties until 4 pm. The strong winds could result in some blowing and drifting of snow, mainly near the Tennessee border, through mid-afternoon. Some single-digit wind chill temperatures can be expected on the highest mountain peaks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey
